permissions: Admins can delete maintenance requirement rules. Managers who are members of a broker can delete rules for their brokers. Operations members with manager business unit membership can delete rules only when a business unit is specified and they belong to it. Operations members can delete rules only when a business unit is specified and they belong to it.
side_effects: Deletes the maintenance requirement rule and its maintenance requirement rule evaluations.
validation_notes: Requires a maintenance requirement rule ID argument. --confirm is required. Deletion is blocked if the rule is associated to maintenance requirement sets (restricted association).
